UI_visible_response: Read 19 web pagesView Page DetailsIn 2020, the Songzao Coal Mine in Chongqing experienced a tragic accident. On September 27, a fire broke out on a conveyor belt, producing high levels of carbon monoxide gas. This led to the deaths of 16 miners who were trapped underground. Another miner was rescued but was in critical condition. The mine, operated by Chongqing Energy Investment Group, had previously been cited for safety violations. Following the incident, an investigation was launched to determine the cause of the fire.CopyTry AgainShare
traffic_visible_response: In 2020, the Songzao Coal Mine in Chongqing experienced a tragic accident. On September 27, a fire broke out on a conveyor belt, producing high levels of carbon monoxide gas. This led to the deaths of 16 miners who were trapped underground[^1^][^4^][^5^]. Another miner was rescued but was in critical condition[^11^]. The mine, operated by Chongqing Energy Investment Group, had previously been cited for safety violations[^5^]. Following the incident, an investigation was launched to determine the cause of the fire[^4^].
